creator: Vu Long
descriptionHtml:
Research about head and neck flexion angles and their affect on neck pains: https://www.researchgate.net/figure/Dependent-variables-Head-and-neck-fl-exion-angles-and-the-cranio-cervical-angle-along_fig3_221748604

Often, we see in our offices the damage done by technology leading to neck pain, headaches, bad vision, and numbness in the hands. The Maple Healthcare posture app is designed to give you a notification or to dim your screen when your phone is being used at a bad angle for neck and head posture. This will gently prompt you to elevate the phone to a proper angle for a much healthier neck.
For parents, there is an especially great tool inside to install it on your child’s phone and lock it so they can’t change the settings. This is especially important as we have been seeing children’s posture is permanently damaged by phone and computer use. This app will allow you to see how much they sit in proper or bad posture.

Reference information regarding common neck pains problem and correct neck posture https://maplehealthcare.net/neck-pain-chiropractic-vietnam

* Medical Disclaimer: posture data is provided for information purposes only and is not intended as medical advice, or as a substitute for the medical advice of a physician. Patients should not use the information provided by this app for diagnosing a health or fitness problem or disease. Patients should always consult with a doctor or other health care professional for medical advice or information about diagnosis and treatment.
descriptionShort: This app reminds you to keep head posture that is good for your neck

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: This release allows you to set the preferred angle for our neck posture police robot to start yelling

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Your neck needs a break! Keep it up straight!
So does our Posture Monitoring Robot. This update allow the app to stop tracking your posture while the phone is locked!
